articles.title: Evraz PLC plans to sell off North American assets, including steel plant in Regina - CBC.ca
articles.description: The Russian steel and mining company Evraz PLC has announced it plans to sell its North American assets, which include a steel plant in Regina.
articles.content:
The Russian steel and mining company Evraz PLC has announced it plans to sell its North American assets, which include a steel plant in Regina that employs 1,200 people.
